definition: A type of food product that is typically consumed for breakfast or as a snack. It is often spread on bread or toast and is made from ground nuts, usually with added sugar or other sweeteners.

examples.german: Der brein ist ein wichtiges Organ
examples.english: The brain is an important organ
The brain controls many bodily functions

examples.german: Ein gesunder brein ist wichtig für die geistige Gesundheit
examples.english: A healthy brain is important for mental health
